title: Someone's changed my account information, and I can't change it back.
body:
Someone apparently got access to my account. They changed the password and the verified e-mail address. Without knowing the current password, I can't change anything back. The only reason I can even do this is because my account is still logged in on my browser. I wasn't really sure what to do about this or where I should go, so I decided to just post something here and hope that I at least get some advice about where I should go next to get help with this. I'll happily provide all the proof I possibly can to prove to Riot that I'm the actual owner of this account, including e-mails dating back to 2013 at MY e-mail address which is not the current one on the account, and even the credit card information I use to purchase Riot Points.

Seriously, I really need some help here. If I can't get Riot to help me out here, then please someone at least tell where I **should ** go to get their help.

replies.body: We'd like to help out with your specific issue individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  If you're unable to access the support center, you can also send us an email via support@riotgames.com.  It may take a bit to receive a response depending on the queue, but we'll reply as soon as possible.  Hang tight!
I eventually found my way to the support center, and got my account back really quickly. Thanks to Rito for the super speedy support help. Certainly put me in the mood to grab some RP.
